# make df's for atlas-specific Edge names 
```{r}

# function for creating df of edge names: remove self-connecting edges
# @param nrows_var A numeric var of rows in parcel_labels
# @param atlas_edges An empty vector to be populated by edge names
# @param parcel_labels A df of parcel labels  
make_edges <- function(nrows_var, atlas_edges, parcel_labels) {
    for(i in c(1:nrows_var)){
      for(j in (c((i+1):nrows_var))) {
      x<-paste0(parcel_labels$orig_parcelname[i], "_to_", parcel_labels$orig_parcelname[j])
      atlas_edges <- append(atlas_edges, x) 
      print(paste(i, j))
      }
    }
  return(atlas_edges)
}
 

# function for removing last 2 entries in edges_df
# @param edge_df A df of edge names
rm_last_2 <- function(edge_df) {
  b <- length(edge_df)
  a <- b-1
  edge_df <- edge_df[-c(a:b)] 
  return(edge_df)
}

  

# schaefer200x7 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
schaefer200x7.parcel.labels <- read.csv("/cbica/projects/network_replication/atlases/parcellations/schaefer200x7_regionlist_final.csv")
names(schaefer200x7.parcel.labels)[1] <- "orig_parcelname"
rows_schaefer200x7 <- nrow(schaefer200x7.parcel.labels)
schaefer200x7_edges <- c()
schaefer200x7_edges <- make_edges(rows_schaefer200x7, schaefer200x7_edges, schaefer200x7.parcel.labels)
schaefer200x7_edges <- rm_last_2(schaefer200x7_edges)
write.csv(schaefer200x7_edges, "/cbica/projects/network_replication/atlases/edge/schaefer200x7_edge.csv")

  


```
